SELECT BM.ITEM_CODE, BM.PARENT_ITEM_CODE , BM.ITEM_NAME, BM.ITEM_CLASSIFICATION , BM.LEAD_TIME, BM.LOSS_RATE , BM.STANDARD_UNIT_PRICE, BM.NET_AMOUNT ,IT.ITEM_NAME AS PARENT_ITEM_NAME FROM ( SELECT B.LV, LPAD(B.ITEM_CODE,B.LV*10) AS ITEM_CODE , B.PARENT_ITEM_CODE, I.ITEM_NAME , B.NET_AMOUNT, I.ITEM_CLASSIFICATION , I.LEAD_TIME, NVL(I.LOSS_RATE,0) AS LOSS_RATE , I.STANDARD_UNIT_PRICE, ROW_NUMBER() OVER(ORDER BY ROWNUM) AS RN FROM ( SELECT LEVEL AS LV, ITEM_CODE , PARENT_ITEM_CODE, NET_AMOUNT FROM BOM START WITH ITEM_CODE = #{itemCode} CONNECT BY NOCYCLE
PRIOR ITEM_CODE = PARENT_ITEM_CODE) B, ITEM I WHERE B.ITEM_CODE = I.ITEM_CODE ) BM, ITEM IT WHERE BM.PARENT_ITEM_CODE = IT.ITEM_CODE(+) ORDER BY BM.RN
ITEM_CODE = PRIOR PARENT_ITEM_CODE) B, ITEM I WHERE B.ITEM_CODE = I.ITEM_CODE ) BM, ITEM IT WHERE BM.PARENT_ITEM_CODE = IT.ITEM_CODE(+) ORDER BY BM.RN
